definitions.text: a business relation in which two parties compete to gain customers
examples: business competition can be fiendish at times

definitions.text: an occasion on which a winner is selected from among two or more contestants
the act of competing as for profit or a prize
examples: the teams were in fierce contention for first place

definitions.text: the contestant you hope to defeat
examples: he had respect for his rivals
he wanted to know what the competition was doing
